mapper.insert: INSERT INTO essentialInfo_tb(shareHouseId, sex, floorTotalFloor, parking, lift, managementFee, buildingType) VALUES(#{shareHouseId}, #{sex}, #{floorTotalFloor}, #{parking}, #{lift}, #{managementFee}, #{buildingType})
mapper.update: UPDATE essentialInfo_tb SET sex = #{sex}, floorTotalFloor = #{floorTotalFloor}, parking = #{parking}, lift = #{lift}, managementFee = #{managementFee}, buildingType = #{buildingType} WHERE shareHouseId = #{shareHouseId}
mapper.select: SELECT shareHouseId, sex, floorTotalFloor, parking, lift, managementFee, buildingType FROM essentialInfo_tb WHERE shareHouseId = #{shareHouseId}
